The photo in the article is a picture of: not a giant Mekong catfish, as claimed.
The photo was edited to make the catfish: 3. Giant Mekong catfish, which can grow up to 650 pounds, are native to the Mekong River in Southeast Asia and have never been seen in the United States.
The story was published on April 1: 2016, which is commonly associated with April Fools' Day pranks, raising doubts about its authenticity.
